page.title: 01* STEVENAGE OLD AND NEW *
page.content: "The Old and the New" would be a good description of this{"D" }block. The{ {Stevenage High Street }is very old whilst the{Stevenage New Town}is very modern. The block includes two villages, {Little Wymondley }and{ {Graveley.}Little Wymondley has a large electricity transformer station whilst Graveley has a Citroen car dealer. There is a motorway called the{A1M},as well as a railway line which links London with {Edinburgh. }When coming southwards towards Stevenage on the A1M, one of the first things you see is{Lister Hospital.}In the new part of Stevenage is a{shopping centre}and a number of housing estates called neighbourhoods.Most of the new houses in this block are in the Symonds Green neighbourhood.There are several farms and a factory making school furniture.
